Firestrike grinned. "There is no need, the damage has been done 
already and you are weak now.  I am not saying I will not follow you 
Megatron, you have done much, and taken the Decepticons far. What I 
am saying however, is I will not cowl under your antics, to be one of 
your lackeys you can throw around.  That does nothing but weaken the 
moral of one and the strength of many."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron looked straight at Firestrike, his hands on his hips. "I am
> busy now Nightstrike." He then looked Firestrike with a stare that 
would
> crush a warship. "Then shoot me, shoot up the Decepticon cause, 
until I
> came around the Decepticons were just a pipe dream, I built this 
maching
> of conquest, SHOOT ME." he yelled.
> 
> Menasor looked on in confusion at what was happening, first at
> Firestrike, then Megatron.
